title: Bitwarden Overview
description: This dashboard provides an overview of Bitwarden event logs, which includes item, organization, user, collection, and group activities.

definition.content:
**[Bitwarden](https://bitwarden.com/)** password manager generates, stores, and secures important digital assets in an end-to-end encrypted vault. Users can access their data from anywhere, on any device (desktop, laptop, mobile devices) with secure cloud syncing or self-hosted deployment.

This dashboard provides an overview of Bitwarden event logs, which includes item, organization, user, collection, and group activities.

For more information, see the [Bitwarden Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/bitwarden/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

search.query: source:bitwarden service:event-logs @eventCategory:(item-events OR collection-events OR user-events OR organization-events OR group-events) $acting_user_name $acting_user_email $event_type $acting_user_type $group_name $acting_user_ip $event_category

definition.content: Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates the Bitwarden event logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
